original_text: Then the Lord said to me: “Even if Moses and Samuel were to stand before me, my heart would not go out to this people. Send them away from my presence! Let them go!
korean_text: 여호와께서 내게 이르시되 모세와 사무엘이 내 앞에 섰다 할지라도 내 마음은 이 백성을 향할 수 없나니 그들을 내 앞에서 쫓아 내보내라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord said to me:
Even if Moses and Samuel were to stand before me,
my heart would not go out to this people.
sentences.korean_translation: 내 마음이 이 백성에게 향하지 않을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Send them away from my presence!
